item.title: hirarchical topic classifier
item.description: Description Given a hierarchy of labels, how would you label a given item. Question Statement How to obtain the ground truth? How do you obtain the training data? How to determine the terminal level of the label in the hierarchy? How do you handle similar labels across different paths in the tree? Loss function? Bonus points if candidate talks about Hyperbolic geometric space.

item.title: Find and Answer similar questions
item.description: Many people use groups every day they use these groups to ask and answer questions. However, unfortunately, like the search in this group is not perfect and there might be question duplicate or might be related questions there also might be people we want to prompt who based on the previous activity and might be a good good person to try to answer this particular question how would you design such system so so that you can find an answer for similar questions in the group? so this is a general.
